CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 23, 1957, pg. A12 reads: "The Ladies WIll Help - Bethel AME Church's drive for $350,000 to pay for a new church got under way at a kickoff dinner, Feb. 15.  Female members of the congregation were present to lend a helping hand.  Snapped by The Courier photographer, discussing the drive with James E. Brevard, are, left to right: Mrs. Charles Jones, Mrs. Lucy Fulton and Miss Sally Fern. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of James E. Brevard, Mrs. Charles Jones, Lucy Fulton, and Sally Fern, standing in interior for Bethel AME Church dinner fundraiser
